thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma on VOGUE cover will bring out the 'feminist' in you! | Zee News

title: Anushka Sharma on VOGUE cover will bring out the 'feminist' in you! | Zee News
text:
Anushka Sharma on VOGUE cover will bring out the 'feminist' in you! By Ritika Handoo | Last Updated: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 11:22 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: What makes your morning even better other than a bright sunny day? When you find Anushka Sharma rocking in her new 'feminist' avatar for a fashion magazine. Well, the talented B-Town actress has featured on the cover page of Vogue magazine March issue. MUST READ Anushka Sharma’s ‘Phillauri’: ‘Whats up’ - first wedding song of this season – Watch 
Anushka shared the cover picture on Twitter and we can't really stop looking at her. The awesome quote on her white T-Shirt reads 'we should all be feminists'. Her fringes and red lips with black shirt and white tee look classy!
